words with camelCase

is upgrading his install of Opera for Windows.

hmm, the Opera installer has "Set Opera as default browser" ticked by default. But since it isn't my current default browser and I don't want it to be. Good thing I'm too cynical to think upgrading would be "click Next a few times without thinking"!
although that's how I remember it being with previous updates, which was nice
I wish CSS had a font size unit relative to the height or width of the view port
hsivonen, can you show what you're working on?
BenMillard: not much to *show*, but I can *say* that I'm considering how to use CSS to format captions if the CSS viewport exactly overlays the video frame
hsivonen, I see.
font-size: expr(screen.width / 100 + 'px')
